title: Cannabinoid Capital
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The CBD market has recently seen a multi-billion dollar deal and HempFusion going public. HempFusion Co-Founder/CEO Dr. Jason Mitchell and CCO Danny Brody join Rena Sherbill to discuss radical transparency, methodical growth and becoming more efficient during Covid. We also cover the opportunity in probiotics and hemp. Doing things right as opposed to Right Away and why expansion is absolute. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
